function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Off-label use of favipiravir for sars-cov-2 treatment","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investigation of new drugs for covid-19 therapy, such as tocilizumab and ace2-targeted treatments, may have unknown side effects and long-term impacts.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 in the built environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of operators within confined environments","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitization procedures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate isolation room for suspicious cases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact with individuals suffering from acute respiratory infections","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper glove usage leading to contamination","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of disease through respiratory particles","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of n95 masks with exhalation valve may not provide adequate protection from airborne particles","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Varying filtering power of disposable surgical masks depending on the model and size of aerosol particles","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection from small particles and droplet nuclei","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient supply of protective masks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imperfect protection provided by masks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorrect adhesion of facial filter leading to improper protection from sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of improperly adhered surgical disposable masks leading to reduced protection from sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection of eyes from exposure to sars-cov-2 due to lack of safety goggles and visors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact with potentially infected person","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reuse of disposable isolation gowns","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection for employees in high-risk areas","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of essential and public services","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning and sanitizing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate isolation facilities","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ppe usage leading to increased transmission risk","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of organizational, environmental, and personal measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global greenhouse gas emissions have increased more than 40% over the last 25 years, leading to planet-changing forces in motion.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid transformation of the built environment to support mitigation and adaptation strategies","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-lasting buildings as human artefacts","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unabated increase in greenhouse gas emissions and global warming","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and insufficient space leading to the potential for rapid disease transmission within buildings.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased building operational energy and associated ghg emissions due to technological advances in building design.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Building-related health issues due to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive assessment of environmental considerations in building industry.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reductive and fragmented thinking in assessment methods.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simplification of the context and processes of the systems in assessment methods.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discrepancy between predicted and measured energy use","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misrepresentation of building performance in green building assessments","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of environmental performance issues in assessment methods","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of ghg emissions across different types of buildings","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low reduction of ghg emissions in certified buildings","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anticipated increase in new buildings with low embodied and operational carbon","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low rate of building renovations that reduce carbon emissions","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on reducing adverse environmental impacts in building design","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing human impacts from building practices","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear distinction in the production of the built environment","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate design for climate change adaptation in built environments","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective integration of natural systems into building construction","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inflexible boundaries and limits in building governance","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"}]}
